entry.title: $2600 // Newly renovated>> 1 bedrooms are stellar!spacious bedroomsâ€¢
entry.content:
1 Bed / 1 Bath at 439 Knickerbocker Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11237, USA in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Small Pets Allowed. These newly renovated 1 bedrooms are stellar! Huge open concept living room and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, high ceilings, sunny windows throughout, spacious bedrooms with ample closet space, shared roof deck, the works! Steps away from the Knickerbocker Avenue M train, and walkable to the Myrtle-Wyckoff Avenue L & M, along with lots of retail, coffee shops, bars, restaurants, etc.

TEXT Kate at 3-four-seven-834-sixteen-88 and mention this ad. I also have plenty of other listings in the same neighborhood, just ask!

entry.title: $2550 // BEST LOCATION IN BUSHWICK! DONT MISS IT! BASEMENT + YARD + PETS!
entry.content:
MASSIVE 2 bedrooms DUPLEX /1.5 bathroom apartment! Just a couple blocks from the Central M, Morgan L or the Myrtle-Broadway Express JMZ!

Master bedroom fits a king size bed (plus some!) and second bedroom is a full size!
Downstairs you will have TONS of space!! Plus a little porch area :)

his apartment is across the street from a laundry-mat and also there will be laundry in the building soon!

Heat and hot water included!

If you know Bushwick, you'll know that this location can NOT be beat! House of Yes, Lot 45, Maria Hernandez Park, Roberta's Pizza, Tutu's and Bushwick Bakery are all with-in steps away from your apartment.

------- NO BROKER FEE -------
Credit/income check! co-signers are welcome! :)

Just first month and security!

Call/text anytime!
